metadata.synopsis: Two dwarven locals discuss the business opportunities coming with the refugees: cheap labor begging for something to do, that's gotta be worth something! This is the Dwarf01's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -5; 57; -99- Talk to dwarf 01 of the Business is Business vignette.

0.speaker: Nisvan
0.text: If I hire the refugees, then I get cheap labour, and they get coin. It's a good deal for everyone!

1.speaker: Nisvan
1.text: You might see a bunch of refugees, but I see a ripe business opportunity - if you're lucky, I might even let you invest.
